title: Installation issue: quantum-espresso not building with hdf5=serial variant
body:
The quantum-espresso package can not be built with hdf5=serial support since #12765 was merged. 
---

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install quantum-espresso%intel hdf5=serial # or hdf5=parallel
... 
  >> 460    ifort: error #10236: File not found:  '='
  >> 461    make[2]: *** [iotk_base.o] Error 1
     462    make[2]: Leaving directory `/dev/shm/gpjohnsn/spack-stage-quantum-espresso-6.4.1-kvtuqt4gelumn6f6gyslwve76y4ahip4/spack-src/S3D
            E/iotk/src'
  >> 463    make[1]: *** [libiotk] Error 2
     464    make[1]: Leaving directory `/dev/shm/gpjohnsn/spack-stage-quantum-espresso-6.4.1-kvtuqt4gelumn6f6gyslwve76y4ahip4/spack-src/ins
            tall'
  >> 465    make: *** [libiotk] Error 2
```
Using `git bisect` shows this started failing with commit 5cd28847e81b3a1bf659d184c990ba9144974624, when #12765 was merged. The relevant code in the quantum-espresso package.py is:
```
        if spec.variants['hdf5'].value != 'none':
            make_inc = join_path(self.stage.source_path, 'make.inc')
            hdf5_libs = ' '.join(spec['hdf5:hl,fortran'].libs)
            filter_file(r'HDF5_LIB([\s]*)=([\s\w\-\/.,]*)',
                        'HDF5_LIB = {0}'.format(hdf5_libs),
                        make_inc)
```
@alalazo I am not sure if this should be fixed in the package or in core. The failure for hdf5=serial and hdf5=parallel cases fail at different points but with similar errors. For the hdf5=parallel case:
```
  >> 4033    ifort: error #10236: File not found:  '/opt/packages/gpjohnsn/opt/ssoft/apps/linux-centos7-sandybridge/intel-19.0.4/hdf5-1.10.
             5-25uu6hf3mdit6daagrurrxmwso3uzxn6/lib/libhdf5.soFOX_LIB'
  >> 4034    ifort: error #10236: File not found:  '='
  >> 4035    make[2]: *** [pw.x] Error 1
     4036    make[2]: Leaving directory `/dev/shm/gpjohnsn/spack-stage-quantum-espresso-6.4.1-tza2u5govp32lyk47qmqci6ffdkv6tgb/spack-src/PW
             /src'
  >> 4037    make[1]: *** [pw] Error 1
     4038    make[1]: Leaving directory `/dev/shm/gpjohnsn/spack-stage-quantum-espresso-6.4.1-tza2u5govp32lyk47qmqci6ffdkv6tgb/spack-src/PW
             '
  >> 4039    make: *** [pw] Error 1
```
